description: Facts for Life is a handbook that provides vital messages and practical information that parents, caregivers, and communities should know about child care and child development. This version has been revised to reflect the situation of children and the practice guideline in Cambodia.
title: About
content: Facts for Life is a handbook that provides vital messages and practical information that parents, caregivers, and communities should know about child care and child development. This version has been revised to reflect the situation of children and the practice guideline in Cambodia.
